sentences.en: He had on immaculate white shoes.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一双洁白的鞋子.

sentences.en: He looked immaculate in his suit and bowler hat.
sentences.cn: 他穿着西装戴着礼貌,看上去挺纯洁的.

sentences.en: He wore an immaculate dark blue suit.
sentences.cn: 他穿着整洁的深蓝色西装。
她的公寓房间洁净无垢.

sentences.en: Her front room was kept immaculate.
His gym shoes were immaculate in spite of the rain.
sentences.cn: 尽管下雨,他脚上那双运动鞋仍洁净无垢.

sentences.en: Possess immaculate cover efficacy, effective punish and carry average Bright non - uniform complexion.
sentences.cn: 具有无瑕遮盖功效, 有效均整和提亮不均匀的肤色.
她总是打扮得干净利落。

sentences.en: The 1979 Chevrolet is in immaculate condition.
sentences.cn: 这辆1979款的雪佛兰轿车纤尘不染。

sentences.en: The attire consisted of a formal evening gown, immaculate in detail.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服是一套正式的晚装, 细节做得很漂亮.
守门员的表现堪称完美。

sentences.en: The physics are also immaculate, with balls around on the baize.
sentences.cn: 球在球桌上的滚动物理轨迹也是完美无瑕的.

sentences.en: There was a Frenchman sitting at the next table, immaculate in tennis whites.
sentences.cn: 邻桌坐着位法国人，穿着非常整洁的白色网球服。

sentences.en: Welcome to the Immaculate Heart of Mary College 19 th Student Union Website!
sentences.cn: 欢迎光临圣母无玷圣心书院第19届学生会网页!

words.tran_cn: 完美地；干净地；纯洁地；毫无过失地

trans.tran_cn: 洁净的，无瑕疵的，精确的，完美的
trans.tran_en: exactly correct or perfect in every detail
